about_the_game:
A sleepy little machine doll explores a world of whispering trees, worn paths, deep seas, towering cities, scraped and flooded ruins, and whatever else lies under heaven. Meet interesting characters and murder them, or try to avert their deaths. An extremely lethal combat system with manual sword control emphasizes the decision to avoid enemies or slaughter even bosses in an instant in wide levels full of roaming monsters. The finished game will feature flight and more vertical exploration.
The game's levels are generated in pseudorandom chunks, themselves populated randomly with enemies, bosses, friendly npcs, objects, and effects. The enemies have absolute pathfinding ability through these chunks and will roam or pursue the player, while the player's objective is to reach the end by any means be it avoidance or slaughter, betrayal or cooperation.
Game in development, store page will be updated as more assets are completed.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit depictions of suicide or self-harm, bloody swordfights, consumption of alcohol, (hopefully)scary monsters and scenes. Sexuality might be a conversation topic at some point, the main character's skirt/jacket reveals her legs because the flat shading wasn't working. Game in development, content subject to change.
